taskGroup.name: Create an Eclipse plug-in
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps to create a plug-in, a plug-in extension, a feature and an update site using the Plug-in Development Environment (PDE). It will also demonstrate how to install and uninstall a feature using Install/Update.
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.

task.name: Create a plug-in
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create, modify and test a plug-in.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a plug-in!

task.name: Create a plug-in extension
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create and test a plug-in extension.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a plug-in extension!

task.name: Create a feature
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a feature for a plug-in using PDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a feature!

task.name: Create an update site
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create an update site for a plug-in.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created an update site!

task.name: Install and uninstall a feature
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to install and uninstall a feature using Install/Update.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just installed and uninstalled a feature!

taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a plug-in, a plug-in extension, a feature and an update site using PDE. You also installed and uninstalled a feature using Install/Update
